column1: obituary for: elaine ellen markham | cooper funeral home| elaine ellen markham
column6: 2015 in shawnee. she was born and raised in akeley
column7: pennsylvania to clyde and lois hale johnson on december 19
column10: pennsylvania and oklahoma throughout her life. she graduated at warren high school in pennsylvania and later married edwin charles markham in 1952 in new york. elaine worked many years in the accounting field as a bookkeeper. she was a member of hopewell baptist church in bethel acres. family and her church were very important to her. she was preceded in death by her husband in 2006; a son
column11: edwin charles markham jr.; 2 sisters and 2 brothers. elaine is survived by a son and daughter-in-law
